info.author: Phil Schwartz
info.description:
DenyHosts is a python program that automatically blocks ssh attacks by adding entries to 
/etc/hosts.deny. DenyHosts will also inform Linux administrators about offending hosts, attacked 
users and suspicious logins.
info.name: DenyHosts
info.summary: DenyHosts is a utility to help sys admins thwart ssh hackers
info.html_description: DenyHosts is a python program that automatically blocks ssh attacks by adding entries to /etc/hosts.deny. DenyHosts will also inform Linux administrators about offending hosts, attacked users and suspicious logins.
